entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
